name: Robert Godwin
text: Great guy and the craftsmanship of his art is amazing! Unique one of a kind pieces.  I highly recommend  this place

name: Terri Sierra
text: We stopped in to see Frank Ledbetter in his gallery. We were not expecting the wonderful surprise that was waiting for us! Frank was working that day and welcomed us into his studio. He showed us his artwork, talked to us about some of his future plans and told us the inspiring story of how he became an artist. Frank is definitely a local, regional and National gem.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Terri!

resp.text: Thank you Jon!!! We love having you at the gallery.

text: Really great local art store. They have  a great selection of art supplies and a lot of local art for sale. I have always had a friendly smile greet me and great conversation. Thank you for everything.

resp.text: Thanks for the great comments.  I always have said we actually like each other in Foley.  It’s always a pleasure to talk to people.

name: Melody Carroll
text: We are from Indy. We had never been in this shop before and it was one of the best experiences I have had in the 20+ years of coming to Foley. The owner was amazing and very informative. I picked her brain about a lot of art mediums and learned so much. Bought some beautiful local art.  It is cash or check only but it's worth it!

name: Ron Carlson
text: Thanks Jan had a great time learning more. Hope to be back next year. I learn more every time I am at one of your classes.

text: Very friendly shop with lots of nice things. Will definitely shop there again.

resp.text:
Thank you.  It means a lot to know that
I’m making a difference.

name: Tammy Nance
text:
Great supplier of quality art products.
Clean convenient location.
Plenty of cool, local art for sale.
Great prices.
Kind helpful staff.

name: Ronda Watts
text:
My daughter takes art classes with Jan at Jan's Art Studio and absolutely loves it!
Jan is extremely patient, thorough and cares about her students.
I enjoy taking in all of the unique art pieces in her studio,  from one of a kind pottery, paintings and even jewelry!

name: julie wentz
text: Me and my man both got tattoos done here and we’re from out of town! And we absolutely loved them! Everything was good! And David... he’s freaking awesome! Kept me laughing the whole time! The whole experience was just great! Cool dude and cool place! And also great tattoos! He cares about his customers and he has the perfect mind for what he does. He took my idea and turned it into something beautiful!

name: Briana Dinicola
text: No name is the best! Got a very small tattoo on my finger from him over a year ago and he offered a free touch up after healing. Hasn’t faded at all since. He was extremely friendly and pleasant while doing the tattoo!

name: Scott Bradley
text: No name is a great tattoo artist, who took special precautions and time while making my tattoo. The tattoo was a great price and came out perfect. Can’t wait to go back for my next tattoo.

name: Terry Duncan
text: Eternal Art is a very professional and clean environment. I love all of my piercings and tattoos! And have always had great experiences there! The staff is very knowledgable and friendly. They make you feel comfortable and at ease. I love their sense of humor and the way they make you feel comfortable. I like joking around and chatting with Sarah. That's much better than an uptight person that doesn't talk and joke with you. It makes me more comfortable that way. I recommend Sarah and no name to everyone that asks me about my tattoos and piercings. Great work guys! :)

name: Jessica Jones
text: Great place to get a tattoo. He works with you to create exactly what you want. Will definitely come back!

name: Sarah Boothe
text: Ive always got my tats done there and i love them! I recently went there to get the venom bite piercing and it was a great experience. I'll be going back in a few weeks for more piercings and tats! Great people too!

name: michael glasgow
text: I had my nipple re-pierced at eternal art tattoo and I have got to say, it was anot awesome experience. Virtually painless. The whole process only took maybe 15 min, if that, and Sarah was courteous and professional.

name: Hunter Quinn
text: The man was very talented and calming helped a lot through the tattoo to keep me relaxed! 10/10 highly recommend!

name: William Molina
text: Went in to get my daughter's first tattoo. Great work and experience.

name: Cason Todd
text: Great tattoo shop to go too, very steady handed. Noname is one hell of an artist!

name: Tamiko Taylor
text: Great day today got three tats nothing big i enjoyed my time laughing and talking and the tats were quick will be back soon for more 11/25/15

name: Terry Duncan
text: Very professional and clean atmosphere.

name: James Gwin
text:
SEE SARAH FOR PIERCINGS!!
Sarah has been piercing me for 10 years. The only time I have ever used anyone else is when she took a short break to finish college.
The very first piercings Sarah did for me were my nipples. I was very nervous because I had always been told how painful male nipple piercings, but Sarah made me feel calm and relaxed by assuring me that it was worse in my head, the piercings were a little painful but nothing like I thought it would be. She did such an amazing job, so I've recommended her to everyone. She is always very professional, nice, gentle, and most important quick with a needle.
Since then, Sarah has also pierced my industrial, several other cartilage piercings, 6 Frenums, and my lobes using 6 gauge tunnels. The most recent piercings she did were both of my daiths for migraine relief; the first time in 7 years I have been migraine free for 3 months!!!
Every piercing she has ever done on me has healed perfectly and I have made sure to follow her aftercare instructions to the letter.
However while she was on break I went to 2 different shops nearby for piercings, one with a female piercer and one with a mail piercer/tattoo artist. I had a standard cartilage piercing done by the female piercer. She (along with staff at that shop) was very rude, charged almost double the price, offered no aftercare, insisted on using a ring instead of the bar like I was accustomed to, and told me they were using titanium jewelry.
I used the same aftercare that I've always used but the constant movement of the ring caused my ear to become so infected that I lost 2 completely healed piercings in that ear also. Later I found out that the jewelry they used was not titanium at all (not even titanium coated), it wasn't even nickel and lead tested surgical steel! When I went to the male piercer/tattoo artist's shop the place so sketchy and he was such a jerk that I left immediately.
I WILL NEVER LET ANYONE BUT SARAH PIERCE ME AGAIN. Thank you so much for all of your amazing work.

name: Sixty Seven
text: I go to No Name for all my tattoos. He will put a special, custom twist on your ideas that make the tattoo yours. You can't beat his talent or price 👍🏻

name: Charlie Ray
text: This is a wonderful small Huntsville history center full to the brim with one of a kind artifacts and historical memorabilia. The owners are kind and super fun to talk to. Please visit and look at all the art, history, and listen to stories about the people who really made and build Huntsville Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate your feedback and are so happy you enjoyed visiting the gallery and museum!

name: Dean Watts
text:
Last year we took our 40 year old Oak pedestal table to Fish River Furnishings to upgrade for our Son's new house. Lindsey and Greg stripped the table, dark stained and varnished the top and painted the base and chairs white ...... magnificent restoration job for a new generation.
Recently, we took in a 50 year old dresser that needed "modernizing" and you can see  by the picture they did a great job of upgrading for a Farm style decorating theme.
We had a Mahogany top Farm Table built by a local craftsman but Lindsey and Greg were the only ones we would let refinish it. Greg is a master at staining and finishing and Lindsey is an artist at creating that "distressed" look that is so popular now. We recommend Fish River Furnishings, without  reservation, for any furniture project where you want a perfect outcome at an affordable price. They are great people to work with!

name: Crystal Rogers
text: They did a great job updating my old table. It was less expensive than buying a new table and just as cute and the tables in the furniture stores.

name: Sandra Ryll
text: I purchased an old buffet, that had been painted white and distressed. I love it and have it in my living room with a large, flat screen TV, sitting on top of it. I also purchased a headboard, two side tables, and another table for my guest bedroom.  They have a rustic look, with tile inserts, and fit perfectly in the room. Lindsay is so nice to work with and very artistic. I have an oak table and chairs that I would like her to refinish for me. I am a very happy customer.

name: robert darnell
text: We have bought 2 pieces from here and they painted another for us. They all go perfectly with our house and we really like the quality of their work. They can do some great things with paint too.

text: Love this place!!

resp.text: Thank you very much 😊 we had a wonderful time working with you and your beautiful family.

text: Every tool that I could need or want to play with I think it's there... Members are great, very friendly

name: Mr. Pewpy But-Whole
text: Great space for people who make things or are interested in DIY. Wonderful resource for those interested in learning electronics or computers 3D printing or woodworking. This Makerspace has plenty of tools for those looking to complete their next project. If you are looking to meet with like-minded makers locally then this is your One Stop Shop.

name: William Allen
text: Great people and a very well supplied shop.

name: Clever Bast
text: These people have all the tools and are happy to teach you how to use them for your project!

name: Michael Lambert
text: Great group of people willing to help with any of your making needs! The space has a variety of tools from woodworking to 3d printing to Arduino.

name: Yancey Leeth
text: 3d printers to a classic woodshop and everything between

name: Michael Dürr
text: Great place with opportunities using tools, 3d printers, gather knowledge and meeting interesting people

name: Rick Green
text: Great place to tinker

name: Russell Gilder
text: Great group of people

name: Terry Norton
text: Professional, friendly and cool folks. Had a nice size piece on my back done and it came out badass. My GF hot her nose pierced that night as well. Highly recommended. I will return for certain!

name: Tommy Kraus
text: Thought I had a reserved time. Drove 2 hours and said they were all booked. Great Customer service.

name: Chris Jackson
text: The fellas down at Skin Deep are all very professional at what they do from the time you walk in to the time you leave.  I've had several piercings over the years and I must say Hunter is definatly the best.  Once he asked if I was ready I didn't even know he did it until he asked me if I felt it since he was going behind scar tissue.  More than the purpose of why you're there to begin with you're sure to enjoy the time spent with Hunter Tony and Dave.  So hit em up.  You won't be disappointed.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words sir

name: Kd Luna
text:
Back in 2019 I had a tattoo done. They were extremely professional and kind. I reccomend them to everyone who is looking for a place to go! I definitely want to go back and get my second one done!
They treat you like family as soon as you come through the door 🙂
Great prices as well! Very fair.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words

name: Alex Watts
text: Gotten Several tattoos between my husband and myself and I've gotten several piercings here. We love this shop, and the people who work here. This is our go to for any tat or piercings.

name: Jennifer S.
text: I have been there twice now for tattoos and have had them done by two different artist, and they both turned out great! I will eventually get a half sleeve done in all Egyptian because I found out many years ago through extensive research and genealogy that I am 42% Egyptian, and Cleopatra is my great..........grandmother which was so awesome to me when I found out! So I have dedicated my right forearm in honor of my family and heritage. I will definitely be going back to have all my work done through Skin Deep because they have such amazingly talented artist there, and I have a few more piercings I’m getting which I will also have done there. So if you are looking for a talented tattoo artist and a shop that makes you feel welcomed, I highly recommend Skin Deep!

name: Alto Thompson
text: Best shop within 100 miles. Always professional and super clean ..Tony Puritt is the best artist around...Hunter is very helpful when you call..All around great shop.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Margaret Mobley
text: Love this shop Best ever..Tony does great work,and Hunter is always so nice and helpful...I have Lots of Tony's art work on me and we definitely will be back.

resp.text: Thank you

name: Kayla Todd
text: Absolutely love Tony Pruitt! Great guy positive attitude and does fantastic job!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Jay Johnson
text: the man that did my tattoos was very nice but the tattoos turned out HORRIBLY.. they just turned into open scabs and one of them formed a water bubble as if it were a burn. I went back to show them the tattoo and the first thing that was asked was “did you get it here” .... KNOWING that they had JUST seen me.!! Then I was directed to another artist there who DID NOT do my tattoos and wasn’t even there the day i had got them and he clearly knew that something wasn’t right because he asked “what have you put on it.?!?” And I replied “aquaphor” because that’s what they recommended and that’s also what I used for my other previous tattoos. And then he tried to get smart saying how long he’s been in “the chair” and they couldn’t do anything until it “healed” But the thing is when this heals they wouldn’t be able to put ink on the spots that are MISSING SKIN and they KNOW IT. I was extremely polite until they tried to pass it off like they didn’t see my skin and the colored FLESH that was showing because the artist dug wayyy too deep. I was even okay with the artist not making the tattoo the color i wanted because he claimed he “couldn’t see well” that night so i went with a whole nother tattoo look than i was going for.& I thought it still turned out nicely until things took a turn for the worst.  I know how tattoos are supposed to heal because I have them and have went to MULTIPLE ARTISTS so It’s not me being “picky” or rude . I at least wanted them to be more concerned but I couldn’t get an apology, an offer to make things right, or even my money back. But I have contacted my lawyer and I will have to make the necessary steps.!! Like I said the man who did the tatt was  NICE as ever but he dug too deep and it left permanent damage on both tats and it could’ve went differently had they at least acknowledged what was wrong. Truly sad the way things were handled/not handled.!! No one wants to have messed up skin especially in a place where it’s visible to people. I trusted them with my skin and the art but got done horribly.. this is why I believe with some places you need to just pay half or pay after the work is done and even if you pay before hand, if something goes wrong because of THEM and you go to them in a polite manner even though this is your body so you have a reason to be alarm and HEATED ....then they should at least do everything in their power to make it right and pay you back and try to fix it. But like I said there’s no fixing this and they knew it that’s why I had to take legal action. Not trying to bash their business or anything because my first initial thought was “they’re pretty nice people and it’s a cool space” when i first walked in to set the appointment but as far as my experience and things .... I definitely won’t be going there again and the way they handled my situation.. I highly wouldn’t recommend and that’s just me.!!

resp.text: Looked through all paperwork’s was not ever tattooed at my shop...

name: Desaray Thompson
text: Great shop..Tony Pruitt is a wonderful artist...Hunter is super helpful...

resp.text: Thank you

name: Tina Rollins
text: Very professional nice staff. Willing to answer all of your questions before they start. Will be going back!

name: Destinee Williams
text: The service was terrible. Ran by teenagers who bring in friends and the two people flirt and take forever to get to me.

resp.text: We don’t have teenagers at our shop I think you have us confused for somewhere else we are all in our 50s we have been in business 16 years with a perfect health score.. we are very professional

name: Shonda Hudgins
text: I normally would only allow one certain person to tattoo me but I went back in March of 2017 and got the word "LOVE" and music notes around it for the love of music that myself and my children share. I also have two notes tatted on my left index finger. I used Amber for them. Shes very good and very professional. I'm getting more SOON & cannot wait for her to do them. I love Mole as well, went to school with him. He's very talented but he's no longer at Skin Deep....

name: Kenneth Jones
text: A great place to get a tattoo for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words

name: Ruthie Shaw
text: Absolutely the best experience. Love my swallows. The shop is clean as a whistle and the people are great.

name: Frances Owen
text: Best piercing and tattoo place around. Tattoos are perfect and decently priced and 15$ piercings and a great, fast piercer. Highly recommend this place. Friendly environment and a staff who always meets your needs.

name: robbie robertson
text: Great family!  Very professional!

resp.text: Thank you

name: Rhonda Laney
text: Wow some good work

name: stephenie dasinger
text: Love this place! Great people who do amazing work!

name: Jaycie Dulaney
text: Aaron did an amazing job on my leg piece. I really hope I spelt his name correctly.

name: Savannah Layton
text: I got my first piercing here, it was a tongue piercing and it was a great experience. Skin deep is a VERY clean and friendly environment and I can’t wait to go back for my first tattoo.

name: Kayla Garner
text: My friend and I went in for spontaneous piercings, and Amber was absolutely lovely with the whole experience! The shop was very clean, they use fresh everything for piercings, and Amber was more than willing to answer our 100,000 questions. Her assistant(?) was also incredibly nice and helpful as well, and we had a very memorable experience. We'll be back! #buttholefam

resp.text: #buttholefam!!

name: eden TK
text: I would recommend Tony Pruitt to anyone anytime. He has done 6 of my 7 tattoos. Tony is an awesome artist who does amazing work! I don't plan on going anywhere else.

name: Deborah Schubert
text: Steve Aaron and Tony are my favorite tattoo artist I high recommend one of them 3

name: Tiffany Scott
text: Very friendly and they take there time to make sure the tattoo is correct

name: India Cook
text: Emily was fantastic! She is encouraging and made the experience so great. I’m glad I was able to be pierced by an empowering woman like her!

name: Pamela Lawson
text: They take good care of you here and do excellent work! These are true artists and Steven is great!

name: Haley Johnson
text: I just got stars about 20 minutes ago they are amazing!  Tony is amazing!

name: tammy parris
text: I got a paw print tattoo from Amber and it's absolutely perfect. Out of my 10 tattoos this is the only one that didn't hurt. She is a fantastic artist!

name: Sheila Goodroe
text: I got my belly button pierced here and they were very clean and did a really good job. I'm going back Friday to get my tounge pierced and I'm really excited the only problem I have is that I have called 20 times in the last 3 days and the lines have all been busy and I need to know if I need to make an appointment. And I need to know if the piercer is going to be there Friday so it's a little frustrating.

name: FordTough Lady
text: Most awesome Tattoo Shop in Alabama!! See Tony Pruitt for all your tattoo needs!!

name: Amber Edgeworth
text: Hello everyone, I'm an artist at skin deep and have noticed a lot of one star reviews happening in the last month and have done research on other shops in the area, they seem to be experiencing the same thing. It seems to be originating at a local shop located on Greenbrier Dear Road and/or friends/family of that local shop have been making fake profiles in order to leave fake reviews, not just on us, but 3 other shops in the area as well. Now we know that not everyone is going to be happy, which we respect your opinion. These reviews help us as a business accommodate to the people.

name: Emily Nicholson
text: Waist of time and money if you want anything professional I would go to infinity ink

resp.text: This is an employee that got fired for stealing!!!!

name: Jeff Durham
text: Toni has done all my ink he's been great so far.

name: Kimberly Arnold
text: Great place to get inked.  Will go again!!!!

name: Carolyn Wright
text: I got a nose piercing there last year and they done a gd job and they were very nice and professional and clean.

name: Belinda Johnson
text: Have several tats from Skin Deep... clean, great artists and friendly atmosphere.

name: Patricia Wallace
text: Love my tattoo, ill be going back real soon

name: Carolyn Currow

name: toni williams
text: recieved my first piercing here recently and it was a horrible experience the piercer did not make it a very friendly environment she was very quiet and didn’t speak the whole procedure not even to talk me through the process… when i asked questions she mumbled answers she also pierced my navel off center this was the worst experience especially for a first timer very unprofessional i will NEVER come back here nor do i recommend this place

text: After my friend went there and they messed her tattoo up in over 20 places. I said I would never let them touch me. I'll just give it a 1. I've seen to many things gone bad from this shop.

text: Hours of operation need to be updated. I went because they were supposed to be open only to find after driving 45 mins they were closed.
